name: Hana to Ryuu: Hanafuda?Mah-jong
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Hana to Ryuu?Hanafuda?Mah-jong? is an old-school table game that combines hanafuda game (a type of Japanese playing cards) and mah-jong game into one. Player can play Koi-Koi, Hana Awase and Mah-jong in this single title and spend hours enjoying the two game modes, free versus mode and story mode (gambler mode), at ease. In story mode, player will be given a chance to feel what it’s like to become a real wandering gambler and earn money by joining hanafuda and mah-jong matches in the gamble town. Player will be challenged by as many as 80 opponents, each of them has unique playing style and way of thinking. In free versus mode, player can choose from 80 opponents and set up the game with detailed rules and even local rules. Providing two game modes and loads of opponents, this game guarantees endless fun for every fan of table game.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
